comments.body: I'd say to assume this is always true and not check it within the member methods. It'll get tricky to track what we support when what dependencies are/are not available.
We need to support standalone kubelets, don't we? Mirror pods are an add-on, which should not affect kubelet's basic functions. Or were you suggesting that I moved the check elsewhere?
Ah, that's a good point. This is fine as is.
